Summary I am a versatile Agile Management Coach, Project Manager, Project Director (CPPD AIPM) and Management Consultant (Cognitive Edge certified), with more than 30 years experience across all facets of large enterprise scale business transformation projects and Information and Communications Technologies (ICT). I am also a Scrum Master (CSM) that practices radical development.  
 
I specialise in the full life cycle cradle to grave definition, development and delivery of strategic business solutions using business aligned technologies for optimal benefits realisation. This includes more than 20 years experience with large scale enterprise systems such as SAP R/3 ERP, eCommerce and manufacturing execution systems (MES, SCADA, PLC).  
 
My core skills include Agile Management, Strategy development, Business Case development, Requirements and RFT development, Vendor Contract negotiation, Systems and Process Solutions architecture, Project Management, Change Management, Enterprise Systems implementation, ICT Infrastructure Upgrade and Transitioning, and Business Benefits Realisation. 
 
To date I have successfully established and managed multiple consulting businesses and ICT services divisions, and completed many large-scale business transformation programmes and projects on target.  
 
My project portfolio includes large and complex business initiatives ranging from $3-mil to $30-mil, with core team sizes of 10 to 70 people. Business solutions were implemented for medium and large organisations, many in the government, retail, mining, manufacturing, and financial sectors. 
 
I am passionate about the application of complexity theory and radical management in business to make the corporate world a better and more sustainable place for employees, managers and stakeholders. Specialties:Agile Leadership Development 
Complex Project Management 
SCRUM and Agile Project Management 
Business Strategy Facilitation 
ICT Strategy Development and Alignment 
Portfolio, Programme and Project Management 
Management Consulting 
Organisational Change Management 
PMO Development 
Project Quality Assurance 
Project Disaster Recovery 
SAP R/3 - ERP - Enterprise Resource Planning 
MES - Manufacturing Execution Systems 
ICT Service Delivery  
PMBOK, ITIL, Prince 2, COBIT, CMMI 
Complexity Theory
